abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday proposed a trial of individual circuit breakers on all of the stocks in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index in response to the May 6 market disruption.
snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday proposed a trial of individual circuit breakers on all of the stocks in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index in response to the May 6 market disruption.
lead_paragraph: 6:52 p.m. | Updated The Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday proposed a trial of individual circuit breakers on all of the stocks in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index in response to the May 6 market disruption, The New York Times’s Edward Wyatt reports from Washington.

headline.main: Rules to Limit Trading in Highly Volatile Markets
